fixes.name: Rate Move T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR EndDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustom,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Rate Move],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = EndDateParam,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Rate Move],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau parameter references with SELECTEDVALUE(...) per parameter rules and converted nested IF logic to DAX IF. All column and calculated field references use the table-qualified format 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Column].
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date] and [Parameters].[End Date]); per rules parameter-based calculations must be measures.
